item.description:
A special Christmas Waterfire has been announced:

http://waterfire.org/friday-december-16th-2011

This will be a partial fire that will be lit at 5 pm after sunset, which is at 4:16 pm. 

I'll plan to get down to the Citizens Bank Plaza between 4:00 and 4:30 pm, and we'll meet up there till 5 pm.  From there we'll go and enjoy the fire! 

It'll be dark, so here's how you can find me:

I'll be sporting a santa suit while wrapped up in a string of multi-colored LED lights.  Hopefully that will help you in picking me out from the crowd. 

FYI ...

There is a scheduled "Santa Stumble" pub crawl on the Meetup Singles Group (25-45) for anyone who is interested immediately after the Waterfire (8 pm).  Dressing up as Santa is encouraged.  I'll be in attendance.  Check it out on their Meetup Group page.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a santa suit wrapped in multi-colored LED xmas lights
item.name: Providence Waterfire - "Christmas Edition"
